# REPL

> REPL environment.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var repl = require( '@stdlib/repl' );
```

#### repl()

Starts a REPL environment.

``` javascript
var r = repl();
```

<!-- </usage> -->


<section class="examples">

## Examples

``` javascript
var repl = require( '@stdlib/repl' );

// Start the REPL:
var r = repl();

// After the REPL has started, exit the process...
setTimeout( onTimeout, 2500 );

function onTimeout() {
    r.close();
}
```

<!-- </examples> -->


---

<section class="cli">

## CLI

<section class="usage">

### Usage

``` bash
Usage: stdlib-repl [options]

Options:

  -h,    --help                Print this message.
  -V,    --version             Print the package version.
```

<!-- </usage> -->

<section class="examples">

### Examples

``` bash
$ stdlib-repl
Starting REPL...
```

<!-- </examples> -->

<!-- </cli> -->
